byline.original: By MOHAMED IBRAHIM and JEFFREY GETTLEMAN
byline.contributor: Mohamed Ibrahim reported from Mogadishu, and Jeffrey Gettleman from Nairobi, Kenya.

snippet: Thousands packed into a stadium in Mogadishu to denounce the Shabab Islamist group for the suicide bombing last week that killed scores of people, many of them students.
lead_paragraph: Thousands packed into a stadium in Mogadishu to denounce the Shabab Islamist group for the suicide bombing last week that killed scores of people, many of them students.

headline.main: In Rare Rally, Somalis Aim at Militants
headline.print_headline: In Rare Rally, Somalis Aim At Militants
headline.seo: Somalis Protest Shabab in Rally in Mogadishu
